import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { variables } from './Variables.js'; export class Machine extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { machines: [] } } render() { return (
{machines.map(machin => )}
MachineId MachineName MachineClass MachineCompany
{machin.MachineId} {machin.MachineName} {machin.MachineClass} {machin.MachineCompany}
